author: brushed
msg: [JSPWIKI-230] jspwiki.properties.tmpl was apparently overwritten by an older version. Stepping back to the latest -1 version with fixes for timezone format.

author: snoopdave
msg: Another bug fix related to ROL-1666. This change makes the menu code prefer runtime over startup properties when checking whether a menu tab/item is enabled/disabled.
